alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 9:52PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LOGAN, HARDIN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 1030 PM EDT... At 952 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Kenton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Kenton, Blanchard, Mount Victory, Mcguffey, Ridgeway, Grant, Silver Creek, Jumbo, Huntersville, Byhalia, Pfeiffer, Walton, Hepburn, Mentzer and Big Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
